global_config.__comment: Si la configuration n'a pas encore été faite
global_config.botNotExist:
Impossible to use this command, you haven't configured the bot yet.
Use the `/config` command to configure the bot.

For more information, visit the website:
global_config.noPermission: You don't have the required permissions
global_config.noingroup: Sorry, you are not in one Discord groups authorised to use Easy Management TW bot.

config_exist.1: The configuration of this server already exists, only members of the <@&
config_exist.2: > group or the owner of the Discord can use this command.

noperm: the bot does not have permission for this interaction.
website: Link to the website associated with the bot:
